data.actual_result: The highlight gets stuck until you click somewhere else.
data.expected_result: It should go away when clicking on the name
data.short_description: With the new name highlight, if you click on the name again after clicking once, the highlight get stuck sometimes
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable colorblind mode in user settings > Appearance - Click on a name for the highlight to happen, try to click on the name again (left click both times) - Observe the highlight being stuck
